description: Unit test for the FrameType class template, testing buffer setting, copying, reading, and various data operations.

classes.name: FrameType
classes.description: Template class representing a generic communication frame with buffer management and data serialization features.

methods.name: SetBuffer
methods.description: Sets buffer data in the FrameType object with specified offset and length.

methods.name: GetBuffer
methods.description: Retrieves buffer data from the FrameType object into an array.

methods.name: Size
methods.description: Sets or gets the size of the FrameType buffer.

methods.name: Clear
methods.description: Clears the buffer in the FrameType object.
